vnc
Class UDPService

java.lang.Object
  vnc.UDPService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Config, CommonConfig, java.lang.Runnable
public class UDPService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Config

This implements a simple "hello" service to allow peers on a network to discover one another. Once started, each host announces itself over broadcast UDP, and collects responses from hosts that designate themselves as "servers". This list of servers is available, and it's expected that interested hosts will contact the servers by other means, most likely TCP . As implemented here, the servers implicitly provide their IP address, and explicitly provide a port where they expect to be contacted.

Author:
Ddyer
